> " We all have to start somewhere. It may not be where everyone expects. B=
ut the smallest of changes can always lead to the best of results. Kup, Eli=
ta, Lord Elder, guard the Ark. I'm going to head over to the Maximal Base, =
and I'm going to talk to Nightstrike. I think if we start gradually, we'll =
get to where we need to be."
>
> He opens the door to the outside, and tran=
sforms into a larger vehicle, with a sizeable trailer, looking a bit like a=
 modern day truck.
>
> "Inform me of Night Shift's progress as soon as he r=
eports. Keep safe my comrades."
>
> He slowly rolls off the ramp, stopping =
at the end, and signalling his next direction before rolling off to the Max=
imal base. His speed is kept at a casual fifty five miles per hour.

Lord E=
lder looked at Kup and Elita for a moment as Tuscon . . . err .
. Tuscon PR=
IME rolled out of the Ark. "He's going to be a good Prime I
think." Elder s=
aid to Kup, his voice a mixture of hope and confidence.
"Even if he is a bi=
t hasty."

Elder opened his communication link to Tuscon, "Um, sir? Nightst=
rike
is not one of Hydras' people, he is a minion, so he belongs to
Unicron=
."

Elder shrugged sheepishly as he closed the communication and looked at
=
Kup, "I just thought he'd want to know that. He didn't really hang
around a=
fter he gave his orders."

(TAG)
